name: Formal Wedding
brief: This type of engagement party is held in an elegant setting..
description: This type of engagement party is held in an elegant setting, such as a hotel ballroom or a fine dining restaurant. Guests are dressed in formal attire, and there may be a live band or DJ for entertainment.

name: Backyard Wedding
brief: A more relaxed and casual option in backyard..
description: A more relaxed and casual option, this party is held in a backyard or garden setting. It's a great choice for couples who prefer a laid-back atmosphere. There may be outdoor games, a grill, and plenty of space for guests to mingle.

name: Themed Wedding
brief: A themed engagement party revolves around a specific concept..
description: A themed engagement party revolves around a specific concept or idea that holds meaning to the couple. It could be based on a shared interest, a favorite movie or TV show, or even a specific era in history.

name: Beach Wedding
brief: This type of party is held in a beachside..
description: This type of party is held in a beachside location or a destination significant to the couple. It's a wonderful option for couples who love travel or have a special connection to a particular place.

name: Surprise Wedding
brief: A surprise engagement party is planned and organized..
description: A surprise engagement party is planned and organized by friends or family without the knowledge of the engaged couple. The couple is invited under the guise of a different event, only to be surprised by the celebration.

name: Virtual Wedding
brief: In cases where physical gatherings are not possible..
description: In cases where physical gatherings are not possible or convenient, a virtual engagement party can be held over video conferencing platforms. Guests from different locations can join in to celebrate online.
